CustomField.description: The date a new merchant portal invite was sent. This will be the CSSO Invite date, or, if the user already has access to CSSO, then this will be the date of the first successful onboarding request.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date a new merchant portal invite was sent. This will be the CSSO Invite date, or, if the user already has access to CSSO, then this will be the date of the first successful onboarding request.
CustomField.label: Merchant Portal Invite Request Date
